Articles.Content: Just purchased this game a few days ago. I'm really loving it so far! There is a LOT of potential. I went through all the tutorials and scenarios multiple times and now my next goal is to safely land on the Mun. I'd love to see more official tutorials:cool:

Welcome! Glad to see you're enjoying the game and I (and Jeb) hope you can land on the Mun without blowing up.

I hope to see you around the forums!

-Deejay

Welcome. I am new as well, got it about a week ago. So far I have pit up a sat, around the main planet and the Mun and Minimus, landed a probe on Minimus and just put my space station in orbit tonight and just finished docking its first shipment of fuel.

Being a tool I jumped in without reading anything, which is why my space station first went up with the docking ports on backwards and my first fuel ship had a nose cone over its docking port that I couldn't get off, so I got to do those both twice lol.

Oh well, it's up there now with a few thousand gallons of liquid goodness in it, can't wait to use it to explore the farther planets. And hello.
